RawLine: SDM_1104003209,少俠，這次的事是本店疏失，我立刻讓她去{color=#FF0000}煉藥房{/color}製作清血藥。,少侠，这次的事是本店疏失，我立刻让她去{color=#FF0000}炼药房{/color}制作清血药。

Items.mt: You know, this is the fault of the store, I will let her go to the pharmacy to make the blood purification medicine.
